system.description:
V-harm as established is the attacking car’s massive minus the defending car’s massive or handling, defender’s choice.

When you suffer v-harm, roll+v-harm suffered.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, you swerve but recover without disadvantage.

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value:
On a 7–9, you’re forced to swerve. Your attacker chooses 1:

  • You give ground.
  • You’re driven off course, or forced onto a new course.
  • Your car takes 1·harm ap, right in the transmission.

success.label: Success
success.value:
On a 10+, you lose control, and your attacker chooses 1:

  • You crash.
  • You spin out.
  • Choose 2 from the 7–9 list below.
  • You give ground.
  • You’re driven off course, or forced onto a new course.
  • Your car takes 1·harm ap, right in the transmission.
